pr_title: Fix delete recording bug for renamed recordings

timeline.message: modify regex to allow for renamed recordings, add corresponding unit test

timeline.bodyText: What happens when this gets to double-digit rename suffixes?
timeline.author: andrewazores

replies.bodyText: My bad, for some reason I had remembered wrong and thought it only renamed up to 9, it's fixed now.
replies.author: Alexjsenn

timeline.bodyText: Please make this a @ParameterizedTest and test various different numeric suffixes to be sure they all work.
timeline.author: andrewazores

timeline.message: fix regex for multiple digit renames
